data.name: A long Time
data.detailed_description:
A long Time is a short game about clocks, can be completed in 10 minutes.

Explore abstract worlds in this first person platformer game!


A long Time offers a unique audio visual experience, making you feel like you are part of another dimension or a dream.

Interact with movable Objects to progress


You can control platforms which allow you to progress in the game. Just interact with one and see what happens!

This game has been made during a 7 day long game jam, in which developers tried to create a game based on the theme "It's been a long Time, but we're not done yet.". This is the improved Version of A long Time, made in a total of 10 days.

data.short_description: Explore an abstract World of Clocks in this short First Person Platformer game. Can be completed in 10 Minutes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual-Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
